name: to BD
to App
func:
msg.payload = msg.payload.map(e=>{
    return {
        _id: e._id,
        label: e.label,
        model: e.model,
        type: e.type,
        serialNumber: e.serialNumber,
        color: e.color,
        sku: e.sku,
        address: e.address,
        category: e.category,
        qr: e.qr,
        more: e.more,
        deleted: e.deleted,
        isClient:e.isClient,
        addressLabel: e.warehouse_info[0].warehouse,
        addressWarehouse: e.warehouse_info[0].address,
        categoryLabel: e.category_info[0].label,
        status: e.status,
        categoryName: e.category_info[0].name

    }
})
return msg;
